DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , multiple-treatment multiple-dose , 2-period , 2-sequence study evaluate potential drug-drug interaction danoprevir ( DNV ) coadministered low-dose ritonavir ( r ) tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( TDF ) atazanavir ( ATZ ) healthy volunteer . Subjects randomize receive Period 1 either single oral dos TDF multiple oral dos DNV/r multiple oral dos ATZ/r . In Period 2 , subject receive multiple oral dos DNV/r plus ATZ . Anticipated time study treatment 20 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Drug-Drug Interaction Between Danoprevir Coadministered With Low-Dose Ritonavir Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate Atazanavir
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer , 18 55 year age , inclusive Body weight > /= 55 kg Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 Healthy nonsmoking subject . Healthy status define absence evidence active chronic disease follow detailed medical surgical history complete physical examination Medical history without major recent ongoing pathology Females childbearing potential male female partner childbearing potential must agree use 2 form contraception , 1 must barrier method , study 90 day last drug administration Pregnant lactate woman male female partner pregnant lactate Any history clinically significant disease condition Positive drug abuse screen prior admission clinical site Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV infection Current smoker subject discontinue smoke less 6 month prior first dose study medication Use hormonal contraceptive ( e.g . birth control pill , patch , injectable , implantable device ) within 30 day first dose study medication Use investigational drug device within 30 day first dose study medication ( 6 month biologic therapy ) 5 halflives investigational drug , whichever long History drugrelated allergy reaction History ( within 3 month screen ) alcohol consumption exceed 2 standard drink per day average
